author: SheidaVancouver
title: Best Stay Ever!
text: I definitely recommend Nerva Boutique Hotel if you want to have a proper Boutique Hotel Experience in the heart of the city center. The Rooms are cozy and comfortable designed by style. The location is FANTASTIC , walking distance from all the highlights and very quiet street facing the ancient site Forum of Augustus. Delicious quality breakfast (love the cup of berries and fresh orange juice) . The Staff are super helpful and friendly, they gave great tips and suggestions for restaurants and bars. I can't wait to come back.
